{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -v
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 -r "$1" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
", u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'# Install LAMP packages
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r LaunchConfig ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u" || error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init'
", u'# Configure the PHP application - in this case, fixup the page with the right references to the database
', u'sed -i "s/REPLACE_WITH_DATABASE/', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'MySQLDatabase', u'Endpoint.Address']}, u':', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'MySQLDatabase', u'Endpoint.Port']}, u'/g" /var/www/html/index.php
', u'sed -i "s/REPLACE_WITH_DBUSER/', {u'Ref': u'DBUsername'}, u'/g" /var/www/html/index.php
', u'sed -i "s/REPLACE_WITH_DBPASSWORD/', {u'Ref': u'DBPassword'}, u'/g" /var/www/html/index.php
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 -r "LAMP Stack setup complete" '', {u'Ref': u'WaitHandle'}, u"'
"]]}}
